item.description:
According to Shin, awakening (shinjin) is not attainable unless we embrace our shadow side and live our lives from its truest source. So, what is our false self? And our truest and real nature? How is it that Other Power functions on a continual basis in our lives? Why does this all matter in your daily life? Presented by Ryusan.

From December to the first week of January, registration will be open for our most popular course, Buddhism 101 that explores the life of the historical Buddha and disciples, his teachings, the Eightfold Path, mindfulness and prayer, Zen and the Shin path. Visit our main web site for more details and sign up information. Open to beginners to intermediate.

See our CALENDAR @

www.bffct.net
